languages.text: {n}Маражай ехидно смеется.{/n} "Да, я помню. У тебя еще предостаточно врагов, которым нужно мое личное внимание".
{n}Marazhai laughs wickedly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай ехидно смеется.{/n} "Да, я помню. У тебя еще предостаточно врагов, которым нужно мое личное внимание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laughs evilly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了邪恶的大笑声。{/n}“没错，我还记得，你还有很多敌人需要我亲自关照。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs wickedly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了邪恶的大笑声。{/n}“没错，我还记得，你还有很多敌人需要我亲自关照。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは不気味に笑う。{/n}「ああ、覚えているさ。お前の元には、俺が直々に面倒見てやらなくちゃならない敵がまだわんさか居るってな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs wickedly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは不気味に笑う。{/n}「ああ、覚えているさ。お前の元には、俺が直々に面倒見てやらなくちゃならない敵がまだわんさか居るってな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire diabolique.{/n} « Oui, je m'en souviens. Vous avez encore beaucoup d'ennemis dont je dois m'occuper personnellement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs wickedly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire diabolique.{/n} « Oui, je m'en souviens. Vous avez encore beaucoup d'ennemis dont je dois m'occuper personnellement. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai suelta una carcajada maliciosa.{/n} «Sí, ya sé. Todavía tiene demasiados enemigos y necesita mi ayuda para librarse de ellos».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs wickedly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai suelta una carcajada maliciosa.{/n} «Sí, ya sé. Todavía tiene demasiados enemigos y necesita mi ayuda para librarse de ellos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht gehässig.{/n} "Ja, ich erinnere mich. Ihr habt noch immer reichlich Feinde, die meiner Aufmerksamkeit bedürfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs wickedly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht gehässig.{/n} "Ja, ich erinnere mich. Ihr habt noch immer reichlich Feinde, die meiner Aufmerksamkeit bedürfen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kötücül bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Doğru ya, hatırladım. Hâlâ şahsen ilgilenmem gereken birçok düşmanın var."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai laughs wickedly.{/n} "Yes, I remember. You still have plenty of enemies in need of my personal attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kötücül bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Evet, hatırlıyorum. Kişisel olarak ilgilenmemin gerektiği birçok düşmana sahipsin hâlâ."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
